perturbation.original_text:
b.
Erchonia shall submit invoices to Distributor after or concurrent with shipment of Products to
Distributor at the delivery address. Distributor shall pay half (1/2) of the purchase price prior to
shipment and the remaining balance 30 days after shipment of the Products. Payments received
after the 30 day calendar period will be subject to a late fee of 1.5% of the invoice amount. All
payments shall be made in U.S. Dollars.
perturbation.changed_text:
b.
Erchonia shall submit invoices to Distributor after or concurrent with shipment of Products to
Distributor at the delivery address. Distributor shall pay half (1/2) of the purchase price prior to
shipment and the remaining balance 30 days after shipment of the Products. Payments received
after the 60 day calendar period will be subject to a late fee of 1.5% of the invoice amount. All
payments shall be made in U.S. Dollars.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the payment terms. Section 4(b) originally states that the remaining balance is due 30 days after shipment. This modification extends that period to 60 days after shipment. This contradiction creates confusion regarding when late fees apply and what the acceptable payment deadline is, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Prices will remain in effect for the period of the initial 5 year term.
perturbation.changed_text: Prices will remain in effect for the period of the initial 2 year term.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction. The original text states that prices will remain in effect for the initial 5-year term, while the modified text states the initial 2-year term. This directly contradicts the previous term and causes uncertainty about pricing for the entire duration of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
Exhibit C
Minimum Performance Goals
Minimum Performance won’t be determined until FDA 50k market clearance is obtained. At that time parties will
operate in good faith to set performance goals.
Note: Performance goals to begin 120 days after receipt of FDA market clearance.
perturbation.changed_text:
Exhibit C
Minimum Performance Goals
Minimum Performance won’t be determined until FDA 50k market clearance is obtained. At that time parties will
operate in good faith to set performance goals.
Note: Performance goals to begin 60 days after receipt of FDA market clearance.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that performance goals will start 120 days after receiving FDA market clearance. The modified text changes this to 60 days. This direct contradiction introduces uncertainty about when the minimum performance goals become effective, potentially leading to disputes about whether the distributor is meeting their obligations.
